alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 13 at 1:05PM MST until January 17 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Total snow accumulations of 6 to 18 inches possible above 6000 feet in the White Mountains and 7000 feet elsewhere. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph Sunday. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties, Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains and Catalina and Rincon Mountains. * WHEN...From Saturday night through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact mountain roads.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
